mainText:
Man I used to wish that I could be in Mr Jobs Position I'm 11 and am in 7th g
rade my school loves apple and has many vintage macs and have a portrait of him on the wall I had wished of meeting Steve one day he was a inspiration and a great thoughtful person I loved him as well as many others I hope that apple will not die and will stay strong as it is now and make many new and improved products man I just wished I could have met him before he passed he will be missed as a person of thought, inspiration, and a big chunk of technology you will be missed Steve Rest In Pease
author: Mason
